video.title: El Cartel 2
video.synopsis: Drug trafficker Pepe Cadena navigates the treacherous waters of warring cartels in Mexico and Colombia while avoiding capture by the DEA and police.

episodes.synopsis: As drug lords Don Mario and el Cabo begin a gang war, Buñuelo and Pirulo are jailed, and Pepe is freed on probation following his arrest in Miami.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Pepe strikes a deal with a DEA agent to avoid extradition, while Raymundo listens in on his boss's girlfriend's calls, and Juan B leaves for Colombia.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Raymundo informs his boss about his girlfriend's calls, while Don Mario plots to kill Caremotor, and Pepe threatens some thugs staked out on his land.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Don Mario searches for Caremotor, threatening anyone who might hide his prey. Pirulo talks to Luis Fernando, a Brazilian capo, about a prison escape.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After police find a stack of cash in his car, Vironcha sends his family away. Paredón plots a murder, while Mario's men target Guillo.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Pepe buys a rifle in preparation for a showdown over his land, while Pirulo readies to escape prison. Vironcha hides Paredón in a friend's house.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Peter congratulates Pepe on his informant work, while Juan B names Rocky the head of border distribution. Valderrama is delivered to the police.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Madero discovers Caremotor is sending drugs by submarine, while Pepe strikes a deal with Farid. Pirulo learns his accountant surrendered to police.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Larissa discovers her husband has a mistress, while Racines moves into el Puma's house. Madero learns Caremotor's sub coordinates.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Larissa flees Caliche's house, but he sends Antenas to find her. Police assault Caremotor at his hideout, while Pepe plans to meet with Farid.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: While Mayor Madera follows Caremotor to Ecuador, Cabo instructs John to kill four informants in the U.S., and Pirulo and Luis ready to escape prison.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Their breakout a bust, Pirulo and Luis are detained in jail while Farid is arrested by the DEA. Rocky rescues Johana and her aunt from sexual assault.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Farid helps the DEA, sharing tips about Puma and Negrete. Olano clears out Pepe's ranch, while Cabo holes up in a hotel hosting a modeling contest.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: In Ecuador, Mayor Madera finally catches Caremotor, while the paramilitary try to nab Puma in Colombia. Racines and Andrea continue their affair.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Caremotor is sent to Colombia for prosecution, while Zully's husband threatens her at the clinic and Cabo becomes interested in model Vicky.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: In Colombia, Caremotor learns that his family was murdered by Mario's men. Puma tries to kill his wife.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Raymundo begins working with the DEA to trap Caliche, his boss, while Mario learns about Racimen's affair and goes in search of his nemesis, Cabo.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Mario shows up at the modeling contest, ready to kill Cabo. Zully strikes a deal with the prosecutor to incriminate Oliver, but the dealer escapes.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Caremotor's testimony puts Pajarraco behind bars, while Zully's tips lead to Oliver's capture by the DEA. Buñuelo's wife arranges for his jailbreak.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Caremotor's testimony puts Pájarraco behind bars, while Zully's tips lead to Oliver's capture by the DEA. Buñuelo's wife arranges for his jailbreak.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Pepe flees to Anestesia's place, staying one step ahead of Rocky's hitmen, while Madero worries that his partner may be involved with the traffickers.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: While Andrea surrenders to the DEA to get her son back and El Pajarraco offers to become an informant, XL and Rocky recover their confiscated drugs.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: El Pajarraco tells Madero and Agent Peter about Teto's and Mario's operations, while Antena reveals information on boss Caliche's drug shipments.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Plagued by stomach pain, Cabo visits his doctor, who speculates that he may have colon cancer. Pepe and Anestesia confer with the DEA agent.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Madero captures Don Teto, while Antena aids the DEA in confiscating Caliche's merchandise in the Bahamas, and Caliche arranges to flee his home.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: After Rocky confesses his love to Johana, he is captured by Mexican police and the DEA. Through their bosses, Cabo and Mario come to an agreement.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to capture El Golfo, Lilian poses as a prostitute, while XL's men kill Racines in order to keep Mario and Cabo's agreement together.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: John argues with assassins Las Tres Cruces, then meets with Pepe and Anestesia. Mexican police and the DEA catch Golfo, and Pirulo is sent to the U.S.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: John tries to kill Pepe, who bests him and turns him in to the DEA. Cabo, meanwhile, begs Vicky's forgiveness and Patricia decides to help the police.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Caliche learns that Raymundo is a snitch and sends him to kill Jumangi. Antena is fired as an informant while Zully discovers her sister has escaped.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Tipped off by Anestesia, Verdugo arrests Rocky. Larissa also faces arrest and Johana is questioned, while Patricia and her husband are held prisoner.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: With help from his henchmen, Caliche prepares to bust Larissa out of jail, while Johana opens up to authorities about the Mexican drug connection.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: After Patricia reports agent Sam for corruption, she undergoes a life-saving operation to remove a tumor. Caliche, meanwhile, is trapped by police.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Peter hires Antena as his DEA snitch, while Sam is removed from the Paredón operation. Cabo kills the Venezuelan thugs who had been threatening him.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Maj. Bravo's men slay May. Madero, while Paredón tries to kill Sam. Anestesia, meanwhile, helps Pepe flee Miami, and Cabo hears from his son.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Vicky discovers Cabo has been unfaithful, then meets Milton's son, while Antena plants microphones in the modeling agency. Pepe escapes to Cartagena.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: In Cartagena, Pepe buys a truck using dollars recovered from his stash, while Olano learns that Amparo is out of prison. Anestesia threatens Doménico.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: After being chased by the DEA, Rambo hides at Anestesia's. Pepe manages to see his daughter in the capital, while Cabo learns he has colon cancer.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Agent Sam is suspended, and Maj. Bravo is captured. Olano nabs lawyer Doménico, while Pepe meets up with Amparo's sister at a handicap center.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Olano transfers Doménico's assets to boss Amparo, while Anestesia warns Buñuelo about the lawyer. Cabo's overseas cocaine shipment is intercepted.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Caliche gets out of prison, but Primo is captured by Venezuelan police. Cabo kills Gen. Morales' informer, while snitch Zully changes her identity.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Caliche meets with Antena, while Oliver makes a deal concerning Paredón's whereabouts, and Milton confronts an exporter of hallucinogenic pills.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Captured by police after being attacked by Cabo's men, XL resorts to drastic measures, while Calero makes inquiries about Leo and Estupiñán's case.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: While Morales learns that Cabo has returned to Colombia, thwarting his revenge plot, Oliver tries to hand over Paredón with help from his niece.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Estupiñán faces justice from his countrymen, while Calero arrests Leo. Caliche's wife, meanwhile, grows suspicious about the source of his income.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: El Pariente is extradited to the U.S., and Antena feels heat from a junta snitch. Caliche, meanwhile, learns his wife took lovers in his absence.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: After Vicky provides information on Cabo, Calero launches an operation against the trafficker. Pepe learns of plans to bring his daughter to Madrid.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: DEA agents capture Paredón, while Rocky is freed on the condition he meet publicly with Johana. Caliche exacts his sly revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: While agent Sam protects Zully from a killer sent by Oliver, the senator sends an assassin to murder Caliche. Pepe is finally captured by the DEA.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Agents Katherine, Sam and Peter return home, while Pajarraco, Mario, and Buñuelo are sentenced in Miami, and Cabo’s son and Caliche meet their fates.
episodes.title: Episode 50
